game.name: Lady Hunt
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Lady Hunt is a pixel art action platformer, set in a dark gothic world, where blood has been infected. You play as a huntress, who must find a way to purify this world, inhabited by monsters and beasts.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lady Hunt is a pixel art action platformer, set in a dark gothic world, where blood has been infected. You play as a huntress, who must find a way to purify this world, inhabited by monsters and beasts.
